channel.title: Compiling my 508
channel.description:
I just downloaded berkie scape and the compiler gets this error [code]Unrecognized option: -d Could not create the java virtual machine. Press any key to continue.... [/code]
heres the compiler
[code]@echo off Title Berky-Scape Compiler cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\java.exe" -cp . -d ../Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java pause[/code]

item.title: Compiling my 508
item.dc:creator: @Spill Spill
item.description:
@Spill wrote:

I just downloaded berkie scape and the compiler gets this error

Unrecognized option: -d Could not create the java virtual machine. Press any key to continue....

heres the compiler

@echo off Title Berky-Scape Compiler cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\java.exe" -cp . -d ../Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java pause

Read full topic
